document_data.name: Yeva
document_data.mainbody: '''Yeva''' was a [[githyanki]] from outside [[Toril]].<ref group="note">Yeva is most likely a githyanki based on her swearing by "the Fires of [[Tu'narath]]" and her referencing of her people invading Toril.
document_data.Description: Yeva's skin was the color of desert sand with dark mottling. Her hair was long and brown layered into braids. Her features were sharp and she had pointed ears. She wore silvery [[plate armor]].
document_data.Abilities: Yeva could summon a [[psionic]] ''storm lance'' that took the form of a lightning bolt.
document_data.History: In [[1396 DR]], she met [[Anusha Marhana]], who was lost within the dreams of the [[Eldest]] in her dream form.
